snippet: The arrests, near the Belleville-sur-Loire site, followed a wave of at least 14 illegal drone flights over French plants in recent weeks.
abstract: Two men and a woman are questioned by police in France after being arrested in possession of two drones near Belleville-sur-Loire nuclear power plant.
lead_paragraph: The arrests, near the Belleville-sur-Loire site, followed a wave of at least 14 illegal drone flights over French plants in recent weeks.

headline.main: France Arrests 3 With Drones by Power Plant
headline.print_headline: France Arrests 3 With Drones by Power Plant
